(Simplified: 荠)
Pictophonetic: 齊 indicates the sound; 艹 (plant) conveys the meaning.
  • Chinese Definition:
  • Chinese Definition:
  • ⿱ Above to below
    • 艹 [ cǎo ] grass, weed, plant, herb
    • 齊 [ qí ] even, uniform, of equal length
①(薺菜)一年生或多年生草本植物，葉狹長，羽狀分裂，花白色，莖葉嫩時可食，全草可入藥。
薺菜 [ jì cài ]: shepherd's purse (Capsella bursa-pastoris)
①見“荸薺”(bíqi)。
(Simplified: 荠)

Main pronunciation 主要发音: jì

Other pronunciations 其它发音: Not exists.

Original meaning 本义: Meaning caltrop, water-chestnuts.

English senses 英语理解: water-chestnuts; caltrop

Usage example 用法举例: 薺菜 jì cài (shepherd's purse)

Importance by frequency 常用频率: 3574

Shuowen 说文解字: 蒺黎也從艸齊聲詩曰牆有薺

Character decomposition 字形分解 :
Compound 薺 from grass-top 艹艸 cǎo and phonetic even-grain (齐)齊𠫼 qí simp 荠.

薺字的基本解释

薺
jì

薺
qí
均见“荠”。

薺字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jì］
［《廣韻》徂禮切，上薺，從。］
亦作“萕1”。“荠1”的繁体字。
(1)荠菜。
(2)通“齏”。细切的咸菜。
[②]［cí］
［《廣韻》疾資切，平脂，從。］
亦作“萕2”。“荠2”的繁体字。
蒺藜。
[③]［qí］
亦作“萕3”。“荠3”的繁体字。
见“荸薺”。

薺字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　薺； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页1063第08
【集韻】【正韻】?在禮切，音鱭。甘菜。【詩·邶風】誰謂荼苦，其甘如薺。【董仲舒·雨雹對】薺麥始生，由陽升也。　又【韻會】草名。　又【類篇】才詣切，音劑。義同。　又才資切，音疵。《采薺》，逸《詩》篇名。【周禮·春官·樂師】趨以采薺。　又通茨，見茨字註。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jì］
["Guangyun" ceremonial cut, upper water chestnut, from. ]
Also known as "Liu 1". "荠1" in traditional characters.
(1) Shepherd's purse.
(2) Through "齑". Finely sliced pickles.
[②]［cí］
["Guangyun" Jiziqie, Pingzhi, from. ]
Also known as "Liu 2". "荠2" in traditional characters.
Tribulus.
[③] [qí]
Also known as "Liu 3". "荠3" in traditional characters.
See "Water chestnuts".
water chestnut
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Zong Zi] 　荠; Kangxi Strokes: 20; Page Number: Page 1063 Page 08
[Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun]? In Liqie, the sound. Cabbage. 【Poetry·Bei Feng】Who said bitterness is as sweet as water chestnut. [Dong Zhongshu·Rain and Hail Pair] The water chestnut was born, and the sun rises.　[Rhyme Club] Cursive name.　[Category] It’s just cut, sound agent. The same meaning.　It's talented again, and the sound is flawed. "Cai", Yi "Poem" title. 【Zhou Li·Chun Guan·Musician】Tend to pick water chestnuts.　Tong Ci again, see Ci Zi Note.
